report.title: Report for triggers against NNSS alert species
report.description: Lists the most recent recordings for all species in the survey.
report.query: SELECT co.sample_id, co.survey_title, co.taxon, co.date_start, co.public_entered_sref, co.location_name, o.comment, co.website_id FROM cache_occurrences co JOIN occurrences o ON o.id = co.id WHERE (( (co.website_id = 3 AND co.taxon_meaning_id IN (10,62,63,64,65,66,67,68,69,70,71,72,73,74,75,77,129053,129054)) ) OR ( (co.website_id = 23 AND co.taxon_meaning_id IN (117824,116158,114344,116111,115296,117795,114345,114193,115015,117559,117574,117509,116926,116349,115222,114671,115306,129058,117847,117851)) ) OR ( (co.website_id = 23 AND co.taxon_meaning_id IN (97131,19763,68122,68971,41788,38421,91237,72435,63841,104860,77225,97224,42913)) )) AND o.created_on > '#date#' AND co.record_status NOT IN ('I','T') AND co.zero_abundance = FALSE #order_by#
